amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any funding to be used to enter into any new commercial agricultural lease on the Lower Klamath and Tule Lake National Wildlife Refuge in the States of Oregon and California that permits the growing of row crops or alfalfa.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record of July 16, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 228 (Roll no. 380).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 228 (Roll no. 380).
